about_the_game:
Monster Girl Invasion's original soundtrack, which includes songs from the game.

This collection of powerful fantasy themes by C. Filipe Alves (theflep) are sure to take you onto a journey into the world of crazy Monster Girls.

(More Music will be added to the soundtrack as the game develops!)

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains 2D CG scenes depicting graphic sex scenes.

Gameplay depicts Female Monster Girl Characters attacking and dominating the male player character with sexual acts.

This game explores non-consensual sex themes as well as sexual scenes involving drug use. These themes are present in many scenes in the game from the start.

This game involves themes of sexual assault in the notion of females sexually assaulting the main male character.
The player will battle with "monster girls" that want to sexually assault them and participate in non-consensual sex.
